text:
A Disaster Control Management Plan was conducted at the Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) Bottling Plant of Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) at Peelamedu here, the biggest bottling plant of BPCL in South India, on Thursday. A scenario of gas leak was created and employees of the plant activated the emergency response system.

The objective was to keep major industries prepared to meet any emergencies arising out of eventualities such as LPG leak and fire.
title: Disaster management drill by BPCL
